item.title: Ninit add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "A woman is like a tea bag; you never know how strong it is until it's in hot water." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Ninit add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Anyone who has never made a mistake has never tried anything new." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Ninit add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Ninit add a quote by Dan Brown
item.description: "Science and religion are not at odds. Science is simply too young to understand." -- Dan Brown

item.title: Ninit add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Logic will get you from A to Z; imagination will get you everywhere." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Ninit add a quote by Carl Sagan
item.description: "Science is not only compatible with spirituality; it is a profound source of spirituality." -- Carl Sagan

item.title: Ninit add a quote by Carl Sagan
item.description: "we make our world significant by the courage of our questions and the depth of our answers" -- Carl Sagan

item.title: Ninit add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "No one can make you feel inferior without your consent." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Ninit add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "You gain strength, courage and confidence by every experience in which you really stop to look fear in the face. You are able to say to yourself, 'I have lived through this horror. I can take the next thing that comes along.' You must do the thing you think you cannot do." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Ninit add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "Do one thing every day that scares you." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Ninit add a quote by Leo Tolstoy
item.description: "Only people who are capable of loving strongly can also suffer great sorrow, but this same necessity of loving serves to counteract their grief and heals them." -- Leo Tolstoy

item.title: Ninit add a quote by Leo Tolstoy
item.description: "Tuhan tahu, tapi menunggu ..... " -- Leo Tolstoy

item.title: Ninit add a quote by Carl Sagan
item.description: "Somewhere, something incredible is waiting to be known." -- Carl Sagan

item.title: Ninit add a quote by Leo Tolstoy
item.description: "Love is life. All, everything that I understand, I understand only because I love. Everything is, everything exists, only because I love. Everything is united by it alone. Love is God, and to die means that I, a particle of love, shall return to the general and eternal source." -- Leo Tolstoy

item.title: Ninit add a quote by Jonathan Stroud
item.description: "According to some, heroic deaths are admirable things. I've never been convinced by this argument, mainly because, no matter how cool, stylish, composed, unflappable, manly, or defiant you are, at the end of the day you're also dead. Which is a little too permanent for my liking." -- Jonathan Stroud

item.title: Ninit add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Be yourself; everyone else is already taken." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Ninit add a quote by Apple Computer Inc.
item.description: "Here's to the crazy ones. The misfits. The rebels. The troublemakers. The round pegs in the square holes. The ones who see things differently. They're not fond of rules. And they have no respect for the status quo. You can quote them, disagree with them, glorify or vilify them. About the only thing you can't do is ignore them. Because they change things. They push the human race forward. And while some may see them as the crazy ones, we see genius. Because the people who are crazy enough to think they can change the world, are the ones who do." -- Apple Computer Inc.

item.title: Ninit add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Ninit add a quote by H. Jackson Brown Jr.
item.description: "Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do. So throw off the bowlines. Sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover." -- H. Jackson Brown Jr.

item.title: Ninit add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "History doesn't repeat itself, but it does rhyme." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Ninit add a quote by Suzanne Gordon
item.description: "To be alone is to be different, to be different is to be alone." -- Suzanne Gordon

item.title: Ninit add a quote by Dan Brown
item.description: "Whether or not you believe in God, you must believe this: when we as a species abandon our trust in a power greater than us, we abandon our sense of accountability. Faiths… all faiths… are admonitions that there is something we cannot understand, something to which we are accountable. With faith we are accountable to each other, to ourselves, and to a higher truth. Religion is flawed, but only because man is flawed. The church consists of a brotherhood of imperfect, simple souls wanting only to be a voice of compassion in a world spinning out of control." -- Dan Brown

item.title: Ninit add a quote by Dan Brown
item.description: "Faith is universal. Our specific methods for understanding it are arbitrary. Some of us pray to Jesus, some of us go to Mecca, some of us study subatomic particles. In the end we are all just searching for truth, that which is greater than ourselves." -- Dan Brown

item.title: Ninit add a quote by David Benioff
item.description:
"I have never been much of a patriot. My father would not have allowed such a thing while he lived, and his death insured that his wish was carried out. Piter commanded far more affection and loyalty from me than the nation as a whole. But that night, running across the unplowed fields of winter wheat, with the Fascist invaders behind us and the dark Russian woods before us, I felt a surge of pure love for my country.
We ran for the forest, crashing through the stalks of wheat, beneath the rising moon and the stars spinning farther and farther away, alone beneath the godless sky. " -- David Benioff

item.title: Ninit add a quote by David Benioff
item.description: "You don't like the girl. You don't know what color eyes she has, you don't like her." -- David Benioff

item.title: Ninit add a quote by Jonathan Stroud
item.description: "Besides, if you're going to die horribly, you might as well do it with style." -- Jonathan Stroud

item.title: Ninit add a quote by Jonathan Stroud
item.description:
"Check out that one at the end. He's taken the form of a footstool. Weird...but somehow I like his style."
"That is a footstool." -- Jonathan Stroud

item.title: Ninit add a quote by Sapardi Djoko Damono
Ninit add a quote by Sapardi Djoko Damono
item.description: "I want to love you simply, in words not spoken: tinder to the flame which transforms it to ash I want to love you simply, in signs not expressed: clouds to the rain which make them evanescent (Aku Ingin-I Want)" -- Sapardi Djoko Damono

item.title: Ninit add a quote by Sapardi Djoko Damono
item.description: "Aku mencintaimu. Itu sebabnya aku takkan pernah selesai mendoakan keselamatanmu" -- Sapardi Djoko Damono
